Record.ClassificationPath: Mental Disorders/Mental Disorders Diagnosed in Childhood/Child Development Disorders, Pervasive/Autistic Disorder
Record.Description: A disorder beginning in childhood. It is marked by the presence of markedly abnormal or impaired development in social interaction and communication and a markedly restricted repertoire of activity and interest. Manifestations of the disorder vary greatly depending on the developmental level and chronological age of the individual. (DSM-IV)
